pinDefaults.request: create a SOTA python clone in 3D of the game r-type. all the assets, visuals and audio must be generated procedurally. there must be waves of ennemies, the usual power ups for r-type and visual effects with system particles. reproduce the same game mechanics with the various weapons and upgrades. and remember the game scroll horizontally with the starship traveling towards the right end of the screen

inputs.label: use_context
inputs.description: When true, include this run's active context messages (context.messages) as agent history. If the pin is not connected, the node checkbox is used. Default: false.

inputs.label: provider
inputs.description: LLM provider id (e.g. LMStudio). If unset, uses the node’s configured provider.

inputs.label: model
inputs.description: LLM model id/name. If unset, uses the node’s configured model.

inputs.label: temperature
inputs.description: Sampling temperature (0 = deterministic). If unset, uses the node’s configured temperature.

inputs.label: seed
inputs.description: Seed for deterministic sampling (-1 = random/unset). If unset, uses the node’s configured seed.

inputs.label: max_iterations
inputs.description: Maximum internal ReAct iterations (safety cap). Higher values allow more tool-use steps.

inputs.label: max_input_tokens
inputs.description: Optional per-agent input token budget (max_input_tokens). When set, overrides the run's default _limits.max_input_tokens for the agent sub-run.

inputs.label: system
inputs.description: Optional system prompt for this agent instance (high priority instructions).

inputs.label: prompt
inputs.description: The task/user prompt for the agent to solve.

inputs.label: tools
inputs.description: Allowlist of tool names this agent can call (defense-in-depth; runtime still enforces allowlists).

inputs.label: structured_output
inputs.description: Optional JSON Schema object (type=object) the final answer must conform to.

inputs.label: context
inputs.description: Optional explicit context object for the agent (e.g. {messages:[...]}). If provided, it can override inherited run context.

outputs.label: result
outputs.description: Structured final agent result (answer + metadata/tool calls depending on agent).

outputs.label: tool_calls
outputs.description: Best-effort list of tool call requests extracted from the agent scratchpad trace (post-run). For real-time tool observability, subscribe to the ledger/node_traces stream.

outputs.label: tool_results
outputs.description: Best-effort list of tool results extracted from the agent scratchpad trace (post-run). For real-time tool observability, subscribe to the ledger/node_traces stream.

outputs.label: scratchpad
outputs.description: Runtime-owned execution trace/scratchpad for observability (LLM/tool steps, timings).

pinDefaults.system: You are a highly autonomous coder. you create clean, simple and efficient codes and make sure they launch. If they fail, or just to improve the implementations or create new features, you analyze code to make specific edits

inputs.label: inherit_context
inputs.description: When true, seed the child run's context.messages from the parent's active context messages. If the pin is not connected, the node checkbox is used. Default: false.
